website_summaries.verdict: Get your baby swimming with this solid support float and spring canopy.
pros: Soft waistband strap and 2 buckets secures baby in place
Keeps baby's head at a 40º angle
Can float children on their back or stomach
cons: Cannot be packed down for easy travel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for babies down to 3 mo age. Secure.
customer_reviews.text: Easily fits infant down to three months of age which was the purpose for buying. Most other units say they cannot be used less than six months. This one seems very sturdy, with a 12 pound baby in it I had no concern she would slip through or flip over. The shade screen attaches easily and is removable which is nice. I do wish it provided a little more shade but I guess they were balancing shade versus open air ventilation with net sides . All in all I would definitely buy again, and well worth it! Highly rec for the very young. Don’t waste your money on the blowup doughnut similar units.
customer_reviews.author: klw

customer_reviews.title: Baby loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it yesterday and used it today. Absolutely awesome! Of COURSE it’s a baby; you must keep it beside an adult at all times. I kept a hand on it or put my finger thru the loop at the front. But it seemed stable and very secure, and the baby loved it. Except for the process of buckling him in lol. Gotta order another now. I watch two babies and just wanted to be sure it was worth the $$ before getting two.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely LOVES this float! She has more control over where she goes, as opposed to ya holding her in the pool. I love the fast that it’s made of foam and not filled with air - I’m not worried about it popping. The canopy is great for keeping her in the shade during super sunny days. My only issue with this product is that she never wants to get out of the pool now! She loves it so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Drys fast, easy to get baby in and out of, kept baby’s head out of the water
customer_reviews.text: Love, I mean love this product. Had boughten some of the other blow up floats, they sucked. Baby keep getting his face in the water and if he bounced in the water he’d actually go under! This one... nope! Forwards or backwards his face was out of the water, if he bounced or kicked his face was always above the water. We bought it to go to Cancun, easy to pack. Drys out fast. The sun shade was a life saver. Baby spent two hours at a time in the pool, he loves it! Definitely worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Willhite

customer_reviews.title: A MUST-HAVE for those with infants and want to enjoy the water with them.
customer_reviews.text: Watch a YouTube video to help you learn how to strap the baby into the different positions. 2. We tried to put him in while we were in the pool .. strap baby into position as much as you can laying the Mombobaby flat on floor, table, couch. My 6 mo old grandson fell asleep in under 30 minutes after he motored himself around the pool a few times. Honestly, as soon as they went in he started moving and loves it. He will probably be to big next summer but it was still worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: NCB

customer_reviews.title: Not great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this but I am not. I bought two for my twins who are almost two as recommended by another twin mom of 2.5 year old twins. They do work very well for jumping in the water On their own. Biggest downfall is they can’t walk around outside of the pool with them on because they can’t see their feet and hard to bend over, sit up, etc. would be great for little babies but not so much bigger ones who are active.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Totally worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing my ( 98% 11mo ) loves it. He instantly relaxed. He did kick in it too! I had little interest in the sun shade part, figured a hat & sunscreen would be fine BUT I was wrong I immediately realized we needed the sun screen. It was great! Getting him in it will take some practice but I think we will figure it out pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Well made and worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. It was easy to put on my ten month old daughter and she had such a blast being able to kick her legs and float around. I have two kids and I was able to play around with the older one while the baby safely floated next to us. I felt she was very safe, it is made with sturdy materials. The sun hood was easy to put on and take off. I didn't feel it would pop like an inflatable could. We all had a great time swimming thanks to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 30 lb, slim child (wish it were larger!)
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, as another reviewer described- this is not meant to hold up to 50 lbs. My child is 31 lbs & slim and I could barely buckle her when facing forward (stomach down). The overall effectiveness was great, comfort was amazing, and the product itself is wonderful and versatile- my only wish is that it came in a larger size or with accurate description. I would buy again, if larger!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Canopy broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: I like the float ,but the canopy broke while installing it the very first time we used it. In south Florida the sun is very strong and we sprung for the canopy for that reason. I would just buy the regular version as it seems the snaps for the canopy are extremely poorly made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this float! I kept looking at it and finally decided to bite the bullet and spend the extra money. We were at a friends pool with a bunch of other baby’s and this was the only float that properly supported a baby and made me feel like my 9 month old was safe. He relaxed like a king laying in this thing and when he was on his belly in it kicked like he was trying to swim. So glad I splurged on this!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse_Jill

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best baby float. Fits securely and keeps the baby’s head above the water. Started using it with 4-month old this summer in our pool. She loves it. Started out with a regular baby float, but it sat her too far in the water and she could lean forward and put her face in the water. This is so much safer and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby!
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G. This is a game changer. Grand baby is only 2 and a half month old and loved this! He can kick his feet but still have his neck supported. So much better than anything else I’ve seen. So awesome! So worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy K.

customer_reviews.title: Do not order here
customer_reviews.text: Knock-off and misleading. Paid for this version and the one I received was some cheap water ring float. Grateful for the refund when it was running MONTHS late but so glad I didn't wait and bought the real thing somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: MillFactory

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived much later than announced by vendor, delivery took 42 days. This item is well made but too small, my baby is 5 months old and it did not fit him. The middle section with the velcro are extremely small and the the belt is also too small and does not have any room to losen it up. This is perfect for a one month old baby.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana V.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It is a little difficult to put baby into and get baby out of. But we love it and my son loves it!! Works great for babies!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Aeschliman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The age and weight ratings for this product are incorrect! I have a 30lb.-24 month old, and it wouldn’t fit him let all the way out! Very disappointed bc I really wanted a dependable swim trainer to assist me with teaching him to swim!
customer_reviews.author: DAPHNE CLUFF

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't for us..... but would recommend !!
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 month old hates it ..well made very cute . Hopefully someone will have a little one in our circle so they can get more use than the four times we were able to wrestle our grandson into it ....he was able to flip it rear facing ... Front facing is well balanced
customer_reviews.author: Tlee

customer_reviews.title: Floats well.
customer_reviews.text: Don't need to inflate. My 11 month old baby loved it and she was not scared in the water even in her first experience. I highly recommend this product. You have to hold the straps so that your baby won't turn upaide down. Just for safety until she can swim on her own.
customer_reviews.author: A. Arceo

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I have made for a child. Top on my list for future babies!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this for her daughter, allowed both the parents and child to enjoy their time in the pool. My great grand daughter felt secure and kicked and laughed at the freedom it gave her. Her parents were able to relax and enjoy play time in the pool with her, she was held and supported securely much more than previous infant floats did. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: A must have for special needs family
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my special needs daughter! it keeps her face up and under the water and she can still kick around and swim without the sun shining in her eyes. It's nice she can be on her stomach or on her back because she gets tired of being one way.
customer_reviews.author: c.rise

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger babies!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this float. My baby is only two months and he seems totally secure on his back in this. My only complaint is the sunshade is hard to fold, and I must have folded it incorrectly because now it is misshapen. It still does a good job of protecting him, just looks odd now.
customer_reviews.author: ciaobella

customer_reviews.title: Not as stated
customer_reviews.text: Received this product with a sun shade that doesn’t have any straps to strap it to and no toys like stated. Going on a trip tomorrow and womp womp.
customer_reviews.author: be better

customer_reviews.title: So much better than traditional mesh float
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old is extremely active and would not sit in the traditional mesh baby float. He would try to dive forward and there wasn't enough stability to keep him from faceplanting in the water. Well, this baby float completely solved the problem. He loves it and it's secure enough to let him float on his own (of course with me right there), but I don't feel the need to have both hands on him at all times like I did with our old float.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super Safe, nice and very well thought with the canopy to protect baby from the sun (I leave in Florida)... Put my 3 months 1/2 daughter into the pool with it, and she was so happy. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used it with my 4 month old son and it was perfect!! It seemed to be very comfy for him and he loved just hanging out in it and floating around with us. The shade is also a great add on!
customer_reviews.author: Christa M

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY WORTH IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is totally worth the $$$, our baby absolutely loves this float!!! After wasting money on four differant less expensive floats, we ended up coming back to this one, it is super cute, supper comfy and safe, keeps her head above water and is helping her learn to kick because her feet stay behind her, she happily swims in this float for hours!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric oehlert

customer_reviews.title: Great baby float!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to purchase this float because it is more expensive than some other styles, but I am so glad I did and it is definitely worth the price! Took my 8 month old swimming yesterday and felt like he was so safe and secure in this! Baby loved being on his back in it so he could float around and kick his feet. I think it helps them learn to swim since the baby lays in it rather than sit up.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved using this in bathtub. Cant wait to use it w him in a pool with the canopy. Excelent product and dried quickly for next day use. So comfy my son fell asleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: Faina

customer_reviews.title: Safe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I feel like my son is pretty secure in it. He was a little scared when I first put him in it but as soon as he was in the water he instantly loved it. I recently got it when he was 15 months and I wish I would have got it sooner. We will be taking this with us on vacation to Cancun in a few weeks. The only down side is that it is bulky but I love that it will never deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Oropeza

customer_reviews.title: Find a better product
customer_reviews.text: Great float with shade. Tiny plastic tabs for shade became loose and unusable after 3 weekends. No way to secure shade. Flops forward and back but never centered above baby’s head
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lew-yah

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great for the pool- don’t have to inflate and love that it’s certified by the coast guard
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Well made float for babies
customer_reviews.text: I know this float has multiple ways it can be worn. I haven't figured them all yet. But I really like it so far. It is sturdy and keeps the sun off my baby.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. My 10 month old granddaughter can easily float and luck her legs and loves it. Our 4 month old used while on her back and strapped in easily. Also very easy and I felt so comfortable with her.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Westerbeck

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: This floaty is the best I have ever seen. Extremely well constructed. You can put the baby in many different positions. My Grand Daughter loves it. I can see it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome very safe, easy to put baby in and fun for him.
customer_reviews.author: STEFANI LYDON

customer_reviews.title: really nice for actual babies...misleads that toddler up to 2 could fit.
customer_reviews.text: great for our baby 3mo....had to return the one we got for our toddler because it is waaaay too small for him. if you're kid is nearing 2 and not miniature, don't get it. otherwise great
customer_reviews.author: me me me

customer_reviews.title: Water baby must have!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old is a water lover and this neat float helps him get around which makes him feel so independent! A few times in the lake (with mom close by of course) and he already mastered kicking properly to move about. Everyone was asking me where did you get that!
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the money!👌😃
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Very stable but of course you still need to watch your child. We like it because we don’t have to blow it up.😜 Highly recommended!👍
customer_reviews.author: Acel

customer_reviews.title: Some babies like and some don’t.
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter did not like this at all! It made her feel uneasy ! Alit of money for something that you dont know if the baby will like :/
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Secure and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this he was 5 months old when we started using it. It allows his to lick his feet and move about securely
customer_reviews.author: Della Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This has been amazing. We used this for our baby at 4 and 5 months so far. He loved just chilling in the water without a care in the world. The shade is great but our baby still got burnt, maybe from reflecting I’m not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Richard

customer_reviews.title: get the one without the sunshade it's cheaper
customer_reviews.text: three stars only because my baby enjoyed being in it but you might as well get the one without the sunshade because the sunshade was pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but an excellent item
customer_reviews.text: What a great floating device for the kids. My son was so relaxed that he felt asleep. It’s bulky but completely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Joegalle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Put my son in this for his first pool experience. Smiles all the way. I never felt that he was unsafe in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B

customer_reviews.title: 4 month old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at the pool party was so impressed with how this holds a small baby (4mo/15lbs/25"). Baby felt secure and enjoyed being pulled around. The sun shade is easy to put on and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cline

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. My nine month old grandson had a ball floating around the pool. He did not tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Daris Williams

customer_reviews.title: Hands down.... best float ever... but NOT Coast Guard Approved
customer_reviews.text: This is the best float for a baby!! He’s laid back and I feel safe knowing he is secure. The only reason it’s not 5 stars.... it’s not Coast Guard approved in the US.....Cedar Fair parks won’t let us use it even with a doctors note. They rather make him use a life jacket that says up to 50lbs and chokes my 15lb baby... when this product is clearly safer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Swimming
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it! He can splash and water and relax
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Jones

customer_reviews.title: NOT COAST GUARD APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: I will update this review after we use the product, but the seller flat out says that it is coast guard approved and it is not. Nowhere on the product does it say that it is US Coast Guard Approved...not super thrilled as I purchased because they said that it was...just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: well made - very sturdy, plus the shade piece is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer/ RED / 1123

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a gift, they live on the water. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: First time using this and it's simply amazing. Protects the baby from the sun and there was no need to worry about the baby flipping. Also loved that there is no need to inflate it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trusfull product
customer_reviews.text: Great for our Newborn baby had been using since 4 months old and absolutely loves it. Very safe and sturdy. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Nathan McCrackin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to use, well made
customer_reviews.text: I have a one year old and he LOVES this product, he floats around and it teaches him to swim essentially, a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Collier

customer_reviews.title: Great Float with Shade for Baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great Float with a Shade for a Baby. There is no hassle of inflating as it has a foam of some sort inside!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it. She chills in the pool with us now. Update tried to put the canopy on the other day and it had zero tabs to attach the canopy. Cant even use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed
customer_reviews.text: Constant compliments and "Where can I get one!" babies are securely fastened in the float. The sun canopy is also a great/necessary feature.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Harris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Best baby float out there. Very secure and doesn't flip over easily.
customer_reviews.author: Browensmom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but can’t strap child in alone
customer_reviews.text: The product seems great - sturdy and secure. However, my child (4 months old) and I are the ones home during the day and I am not able to strap her in by myself, so we can’t use it as of now. Disappointing considering she loves the water and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Daryan

customer_reviews.title: So much fun- envy of all the moms at the pool!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s safe, I do not need to inflate this float, and my 6 month old can swim or push off the bottom in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K

customer_reviews.title: Very safe
customer_reviews.text: My 27 pound kid did not fit but my tiny niece loves it

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!!!
customer_reviews.text: There was no "flip over floaty" in my package, no "free toys" and there are no hooks on the floaty to attach the sun cover to. Not to mention they aren't even the same color. Kind of useless now. For a very expensive product, you would think you would at least get the items you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: The Helbos

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. 3 month old just falls asleep. Must have for infants in the pool
customer_reviews.author: james brewer

customer_reviews.title: Best float for infants!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this!! The baby loves it too! Very comfortable and safe!
customer_reviews.author: A. Carter Thomas

customer_reviews.title: perfect but...
customer_reviews.text: ...one of the shoulder straps came off in the pool. I was, of course, in the water with infant so was able to provide support and immediately buckle it back. My 4 month old had a BLAST in them.
customer_reviews.author: anis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was well satisfied with all aspects of this product. My 8 month granddaughter loves it and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too large to travel with
customer_reviews.text: I got it and I had to return it, it’s too large to travel with
customer_reviews.author: mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best floatie ever!!!! Use for my 4 month old (:
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Great swim device
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome device but the straps could be mad a little better. Have bought for 2 grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome baby float!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the new Mom who is worried about her baby. Safe and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Dale R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sturdy!!! Definitely the best there is
customer_reviews.text: This floatie is the best! Our little dude is so comfortable in it and we feel very safe with him in it. We tried so mesh ones with our daughter and they just didn’t feel as sturdy or safe. We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Czajkowski

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: It can put the child underwater quickly. Not safe unless you hold it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lacruz

customer_reviews.title: Safe, secure & good quality
customer_reviews.text: Secured baby well. Love sunshade & fact it cant deflate
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Baby girl is only 9 mos and loves the water! Feel so much safer when she uses this!! She lives it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies new to pools
customer_reviews.text: 6 month old loves it. Instinctively started kicking around the pool but kept baby from drinking the water
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Lee

customer_reviews.title: Missing tail piece
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived without tail piece. Really nice though. Replacement fr Amazon is on the way so hopefully it's all there this time.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Ehrhardt

customer_reviews.title: Love this float!
customer_reviews.text: Our little one loves this float and she is secure in it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the suggested age group in the pool.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome floaty for my one year old son. He had a blast at the pool. Love that it encourages the correct angles to be swimming/floating.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Seller came through!
customer_reviews.text: Seller accidentally sent a bad product but they fixed the problem ASAP by sending a good replacement. We are good and groovy again.
customer_reviews.author: Van Tran

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Much to small for the money so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Gaudet

customer_reviews.title: 2nd gen is better
customer_reviews.text: Moldy and fabric doesn’t age well. 2nd gen is much better.
customer_reviews.author: A. Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Safe & secure
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome my 3 month old used it & loved it
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, easy to set up and put away, the carrying bag is nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Garra Patton

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had this for my older grandchildren. It was wonderful for the baby this summer
customer_reviews.author: Tressia Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Rusting
customer_reviews.text: This product is great but only bad part is it rusts or stains after being in the pool a couple times. Why is that?!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Every Parent Needs This!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with a baby or toddler needs this float. We have spent money on other floats that are not as versatile. Our 18 mo old loved floating in this. I wish we had purchased sooner. Quality is great. It’s buoyancy is great. When our son was floating or swimming with a family member, I leaned on this and kicked my legs, it held me up (130 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: S. Gaida

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant because of the price but My daughter loves this float and so do it! It’s heavy duty foam nice a sturdy also the shade comes off and I use it in the bathtub sometimes too!
customer_reviews.author: k

product_meta.title: VQ-Ant 2020Newest Size Improved Add Tail Never Flip Over Mambobaby Solid Swimming Float Non Inflatable Swim Trainer Pool Floa with Canopy
feature_bullets: soft cloth outside, pearl foam inside, fully sealed waterproof membrane in middle(easy dry)

❤【Detachable tail】Mambobaby 2020 newest: 1. Add tail to avoid slip over; 2. Size improved, better use for big baby. for 3-24 months; 3. 3layers. Outside--swimsuit cloth: soft, not stiff,not hurt baby skin. Breathable,elastic,easy dry. Durable, no broken,not scratch.no smell and not get hot under sunshine, No fading after long time use. Middle--enhanced fully sealed waterproof membrane,easy dry. Inside--the latest tech pearl foam, greatly improved buoyancy.
❤【Detachable sun canopy】 UPF 50+, keep baby’s delicate skin away from fierce sun. Use both outdoor and indoor. Mesh sides for see-through visibility.

❤【Non-inflate】No need pump. Never leakage and sink. Outside is cloth, inside is pearl-foam. One-press security buckles-lock offers more protection and convenient operation. Crotch straps design avoids slipping.
❤【Two swim ways】 Backstroke and breaststroke. Adjustable size. Best float to play and learn swim.

❤【Package includes】 1pc float with tail and canopy, 3pcs spray water toys, 1pc waterproof handbag. The bag is for float easy storage and carry out. If you have any problems, please feel free contact us,we can make satisfied solution in 24hours.
